author: foxnews.com
title: President Trump Endorses ‘Going Nuclear’ to Confirm Judge Neil Gorsuch for Supreme Court | News
text: President Trump endorsed the use of the so-called "nuclear option", if needed, to achieve Senate confirmation of his Supreme Court nominee, Neil Gorsuch. FOX's Jon Decker has more from the White House: Less than 24 hours after nominating Federal Appeals Court Judge Neil Gorsuch for the vac
